sentences.en: A picture representing a word or idea; a hieroglyph.
sentences.cn: 象形文字代表一个字或意义的图画；

sentences.en: In the Late Period, the hieroglyph of the bird was used to represent this deity directly.
sentences.cn: 在后来的时期内，鸟的象形文字直接用来表现神。

sentences.en: Initially the patterns I used were hieroglyph like symbols.
sentences.cn: 我所采用的图案是类似符号的象形文字。

sentences.en: Initially the patterns I used were hieroglyph like symbols. After a holiday in the Maldives the "face" patterns developed. The local fishes gave me endless inspiration.
sentences.cn: 我所采用的图案是类似符号的象形文字。在马尔代夫度假后，这些“脸”的图形开始发展。那里的鱼类给了我无穷无尽的灵感。

象形文字；象形文字写的文章
象形文字；图画文字；秘密符号

trans.tran_cn: 象形字（如古埃及等所用的），秘密的或另有含意的书写符号
trans.tran_en: a picture or symbol used to represent a word or part of a word, especially in the ancient Egyptian writing system
